biotools.summary: SynergyFinder is an interactive tool for analyzing drug combination dose response data. It enables efficient implementations for all the popular synergy scoring models, including HSA, Loewe, Bliss and ZIP to quantify the degree of drug synergy.

bioschemas.name: SynergyFinder Plus
